content: this is one pattern from the cushie and friends book i make this pattern available for free to get a sample from the book these bunnies are very easy to make enjoy **materials for medium bunny ** * chunky bulky yarn brand stylecraft special chunky color cloud blue 1019 = 65 g * a little bit of black dk yarn to embroider the mouth optional * 4 00 mm hook us g/6 uk 8 * tapestry needle * polyester fiberfill = 60 g * one pair of 9 mm safety eyes * iron wire 12 inches long 30 cm 18 gauge 1 25 mm thick you can download the pdf patterns in many languages here on ravelry i made a separate pdf for each language **e-book ** the e-book contains the english pattern plus the translation into french german italian and dutch the e-book title is in english bunny crochet pattern open the e-book and select the language in the table of contents * kindle e-book on amazon com 1 * kindle e-book on amazon co uk 2 my apologies the pattern is at the moment not free on amazon it was free but amazon put the price in march 2018 to 1 us$ i do apologize and am looking at how to resolve this with my distributors on the other websites below and here on ravelry it is still free * kindle e-book download on google drive 3 * kobo e-book 4 * epub on google drive 5 * pdf on google drive english edition only 6 * google play e-book for android phones and tablets 7 **lapins au crochet french ** * kobo e-book 8 * pdf on google drive 9 * google play e-book for android phones and tablets 10 **häkelanleitung häschen for germany ** * kobo e-book 11 * pdf on google drive 12 * free pdf on crazypatterns net 13 * thalia de e-book 14 * google play e-book for android phones and tablets 15 **konijntjes haakpatroon dutch ** * kobo e-book 16 * pdf on google drive 17 * google play e-book for android phones and tablets 18 **schema per coniglietti multicolore italian ** * kobo e-book 19 * google drive pdf 20 * google play e-book for android phones and tablets 21 **danish edition** * pdf on google drive 22
